name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A.I. Archives: Share Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini, Meta

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to share your Claude, Gemini, Meta and ChatGPT conversations via URL. Visit aiarchives.org for more info!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save, share, cite, and browse ChatGPT, Gemini, Meta and Claude conversations at the click of a button. Visit https://aiarchives.org/ for more info!

- Use the generated URL to create citations for ChatGPT, Bard, and Claude!
- Browse and organize your conversations on the main website
- Compare similar questions answered by multiple models, such as GPT-3.5, GPT-4, Bard, Meta, and Claude

**Sharing Private will prevent post from being shown in recent, tags, and search bar**
